nl.tno.stormcv.bolt

Class SingleInputBolt

  • java.lang.Object
    • backtype.storm.topology.base.BaseComponent
      • backtype.storm.topology.base.BaseRichBolt
        • nl.tno.stormcv.bolt.CVParticleBolt
          • nl.tno.stormcv.bolt.SingleInputBolt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    backtype.storm.task.IBolt, backtype.storm.topology.IComponent, backtype.storm.topology.IRichBolt, Serializable

    public class SingleInputBolt
extends CVParticleBolt
    A basic CVParticleBolt implementation that works with single items received (hence maintains no history of items received). The bolt will ask the provided ISingleInputOperation implementation to work on the input it received and produce zero or more results which will be emitted by the bolt. If an operation throws an exception the input will be failed in all other situations the input will be acked.
    Author:
    Corne Versloot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
